DOC.brief_title: Non-invasive Stimulation Central Nervous System Excitability
DOC.detailed_description: After give prior informed consent , volunteer submit six pseudorandomized session use website ( randomization.com ) non-involved researcher . At study beginning , volunteer evaluate structured questionnaire session , comprise follow experimental sequence : 1 . Quantity quality sleep : It enquire many hour volunteer slept last night . The quality sleep measure analogue scale grade 0 ( bad quality sleep ) 10 point ( best quality sleep ) . 2 . Type eating : All individual ask ingestion food drink could change cortical excitability ( e. g. ; coffee , chocolate , energetic , soda e etcc ) . If positive , researcher record time since ingestion quantify amount food . 3 . Fatigue motivation level : Fatigue motivation level : Fatigue motivation level : It measure analogue scale grade 0 ( low fatigue motivation level ) 10 point ( great fatigue motivation level ) . 4 . Cortical excitability : cortical measure motor evoke potential ( MEP ) , short intracortical inhibition ( SICI ) intracortical facilitation ( ICF ) . All measure evaluate transcranial magnetic stimulation ( Neurosoft , Russia ) . Initially , rest motor threshold ( RMT ) determine find low stimulator output elicit motor evoke potential ( MEP ) least 50 microvolt ( μV ) . For RMT measure , figure-eight coil connect magnetic stimulator hold manually 45 degree midline , place right primary motor cortex ( C3 - 10/20 System ) . The short intracortical inhibition ( SICI ) intracortical facilitation ( ICF ) evaluate paired pulse transcranial magnetic stimulation . A subthreshold conditioning stimulus ( 80 % RMT ) suprathreshold test stimulus ( 130 % RMT ) deliver interstimulus interval ( ISI ) 2 millisecond SICI 10 millisecond ICF . Ten stimuli apply condition ( unconditioned pulse pair stimuli ISI 3 20 millisecond ) . Stimuli order delivery pseudo-randomized SICI ICF express conditioned stimulus percentage regard unconditioned stimulus . The MEP value obtain single pulse transcranial magnetic stimulation . Ten suprathreshold ( 130 % RMT ) stimulus deliver primary motor cortex ( C3 ) . 5 . Spinal cord activity : level excitability spinal cord measure follow outcome : - Hoffman reflex ( H reflex ) : H reflex elicit percutaneous electrical stimulation tibial nerve deliver popliteal fossa record electromyographic response soleus muscle . The value maximal H reflex , M wave maximal H reflex maximal M wave ratio ( H/M ratio ) obtain recruitment curve . The recruitment curve start stimulus intensity deliver 2 milliampere ( mA ) increase step 1 mA M wave curve stabilization ( increase M wave amplitude ) . - Homosynaptic depression ( HD ) : HD obtain serie two consecutive stimulus separate interstimulus interval ( 30ms 10.000ms ) . The stimulus deliver popliteal fossa electromyographic response soleus muscle record . The stimulus deliver intensity necessary produce maximal H reflex ( information available recruitment curve state ) . The difference first second stimulus interstimulus interval give rise recovery curve . - Nociceptive component Withdrawal reflex ( RIIIr ) : The RIIIr wil elicit deliver percutaneous electrical stimulation sural nerve ( behind right lateral malleolus ) recording response ipsilateral brevis head biceps femoris muscle . For reflex threshold ( RT ) record , initial current intensity adjust 2 mA increase step 1 mA , obtain response least 20 µV , accompany pain report . Then , 5 stimulus ( 130 % RT ) apply obtain latency area average . Besides , pain perception control analogue scale grade 0 ( without perception pain ) 10 point ( great pain already felt ) . 6. tsDCS : transcutaneous spinal cord stimulation deliver direct current ( DC ) stimulator ( NeuroConn Plus , Germany ) use pair saline-soaked sponge electrode ( 35cm² ) . The active electrode ( anode cathode ) place eleventh twelfth thoracic vertebra ) reference electrode , right arm ( deltoid muscle ) . Will deliver current intensity 2.5 mA , fade fade 10 second , 20 minute . Sham tsDCS use several study evaluate active tsDCS effect . Sham tsDCS apply use electrodes placement parameter setting anodal tsDCS however , stimulation last 30 second volunteer continue electrode montage 20 minutes.Thus , early sensation ( eg . mild moderate tingling itch ) stimulation site experience without induce modulatory effect . Moreover , tsDCS session , adverse effect questionnaire apply . 7. rTMS : Initially , high cortical representation area ( hotspot ) first right dorsal interosseous ( FDI ) muscle determine figure-eight coil connect magnetic stimulator ( Rapid2 , Magstim , UK ) hold manually position scalp ( C3 - 10/20 System ) angle 45 degree midline point target muscle ( FDI ) . Thereafter , RMT measure . rTMS protocol base previous study . Low frequency protocol : 1 hertz ( Hz ) , 90 % RMT , 1500 stimulus ( 1 train ) . High frequency protocol : 20 Hz , 90 % RMT , 45 train , 40 stimulus per train , inter interval 28 second , 1800 stimulus . Sham rTMS perform low frequency protocol use two coil . The first one - connect stimulator - position coil support close volunteer visible . Therefore , characteristic stimulation noise audible . The second - disconnect stimulator - place left primary motor area . After rTMS session , presence adverse effect compute . 8 . Gait training : It consist moderate gait train exercise 20 minute . To ensure exercise perform moderate intensity use 64 % - 76 % maximum heart rate ( HRmax = 220-age ) . Heart rate monitor every three minute heart polar . In addition monitor perceived effort , gait speed incline treadmill . The Borg scale use evaluate perceived effort . This analogue scale grade 6 ( light exercise ) 20 point ( exhaustive exercise ) . Information exercise treadmill note evolution record . 9 . Spinal cord activity : evaluation perform immediately ( T0 ) , thirty minute ( T1 ) 1 hour ( T2 ) gait training . The procedure conduct follow protocol . 10 . Cortical brain activity : evaluation perform revaluation spinal cord activity ( T0 , T1 T2 ) . The procedure conduct follow protocol .
